title: skin pls
body:
I main INSERT_CHAMPION_NAME_HERE bt really poor atm and I would REALLY love to own SKIN_NAME_HERE to show others how much I really love INSERT_CHAMPION_NAME_HERE :DDDDD!

I am a respect member of the community but in tight money situation... (Parents dont give me money.........) please have the kindness of your heart to gift me this please, I will forever love you :DDDDDDDDDDD

Please please please I love INSERT_CHAMPION_NAME_HERE and LOVE SKIN_NAME_HERE <3 

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: Stop downvoting I just really want skin :(((((((((((((((
